title: Defeat diphtheria
creator_credit: Paul Rotha Productions, Paul Rotha and Bladon Peake
brief_description: An effective plea for more general recognition of the benefits of immunization against diphtheria. Although diphtheria is the particular example given special stress, the film mentions also the importance of observing other methods of preventing the spread of contagious and epidemic diseases.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Rotha Productions, Paul Rotha and Bladon Peake
